data.title: Data Center Zone
data.description: Stable, long-term cashflow generated from digital infrastructure and enterprise leasing, designed for low-volatility income.

data.title: Commercial Zone
data.description: Steady lease-based revenue from retail and office operations within the smart city commercial ecosystem.

data.title: Resort & Tourism Zone
data.description: Growth-driven income from hospitality and tourism activities, offering higher upside tied to occupancy and destination demand.

data.title: Healthcare Zone
data.description: Defensive, predictable cashflow supported by essential healthcare services and long-term demand stability.

data.title: Research Zone
data.description: A dedicated innovation area for research centers, laboratories, and technology development. It enables experimentation, data-driven discovery, and collaboration to drive innovation and growth.

data.title: Education Zone
data.description: An integrated learning district designed for schools, universities, and digital learning hubs. It supports knowledge exchange, skill development, and future-ready education ecosystems.
